SUBGROUP_REGISTER_STUDENT_INSTRUCTIONS_S: The institution assigns the respective student to the subgroup. Please contact the institution.
MANAGE_STUDENTS.TITLE: Participants
MANAGE_STUDENTS.NAME: Name
MANAGE_STUDENTS.EDIT_DESCRIPTION: To change the first or last name of the participant, enter the desired change and then click on "Change".
MANAGE_STUDENTS.ALLERGY_FOOD_DESCRIPTION:
If the participant has allergies, please select the appropriate food. The allergenic foods are set by the respective caterer. If you have any questions about this, please contact the respective caterer. If an allergenic food is activated, it will automatically be transmitted to the caterer for all your orders.

Please note: If the allergenic food is changed afterwards, this change will not be taken into account for orders already placed.
MANAGE_PERMANENT_ORDERS.NAME: Name
MANAGE_PERMANENT_ORDERS.EXISTING_ORDER: There is already a standing order for the participant. To make a change to the standing order, confirm the change with the "Change" button.
MANAGE_PERMANENT_ORDERS.NEW_ORDER: To create or change a standing order, select the desired days and the menu for each day and confirm the selection with the "Create" button.
MANAGE_PERMANENT_ORDERS_ERROR_NO_DAY: Please select at least one day

MANAGE_TENANT_SETTINGS.ERROR_INVALID_IBAN: The IBAN must start with a country code and have a valid length. Please check your entry.
MANAGE_TENANT_SETTINGS.PERSONAL_INFO_SUBHEADER: Confirm the change by clicking on "Change"
MANAGE_TENANT_SETTINGS.ORDER_CONFIRMATION_DESCRIPTION: Receive an email confirmation for orders and cancellations
MANAGE_TENANT_SETTINGS.BALANCE_REMINDER_DESCRIPTION: Receive a reminder when your balance falls below the specified amount
MANAGE_TENANT_SETTINGS.DISPLAY_ORDER_DESCRIPTION: If enabled, the entire week will be displayed in the app view

DESCRIPTION: To place orders, first select the desired date.
If you have multiple children, you can select the child you want to order for.
To order the meal, click on the box of the desired meal.
To cancel a meal, click on the box of the desired meal again or on the trash can icon.
To change a meal, you must first cancel the meal and then order the desired meal.
To view the entire week, click on the box [Show entire week].
Additionally, you have the option to place a standing order. To do this, go to [Standing order].
Here you will find help for the individual functions of the application.
In the overview, you can see your current balance and your recent orders.
You can cancel orders by clicking on [Cancel].
If the field is grayed out, the cancellation deadline has expired.
If there are messages from the caterer, the institution, or Cateringexpert, they will be displayed here.
To mark the message as read, click on [Close].
You can view old messages under the [Messages] tab.
Messages are automatically deleted after 30 days.
Standing orders are automatically entered once the order deadline for the respective day has passed.
IMPORTANT: The standing order runs until you change or delete it.
This also applies in case of illness or other absence of the participant.
If you do not have enough balance in your account, the order will not be executed.
If you have activated email delivery for orders under [Settings], you will receive a confirmation or error message for each order by email.
On recorded closing days or holidays, no standing order will be executed.
The closing times are entered by the caterer or the institution.
To place a standing order, go to [Edit] for the respective participant.
Then you can select the desired days and the menu for each day.
To confirm the standing order, go to [Add standing order].
To create a participant (child) for ordering, enter the child's first and last name.
If the child has allergies, please select the appropriate food. The allergenic foods are set by the respective caterer.
For multiple subgroups, please select the appropriate subgroup. If you do not know the subgroup, please select [Unknown].
If the subgroup can only be set by the institution, this will be displayed in the view.
Without assignment to a subgroup, no order can be placed.
To create another participant, click on [Create another participant].
In the account overview, you can view all your deposits and withdrawals.
To create a CSV file, go to [CSV Export] and select the desired period.
To order food, your account must be topped up with money.
You can deposit money either by bank transfer or directly into your account.
The deposit by bank transfer is free of charge and takes up to 3 working days.
If you want to deposit money directly, you will be redirected to our payment provider.
Depending on the payment provider, fees may apply. The estimated fees will be displayed to you.
To withdraw money from your account, click on [Withdraw money].
Here you will find all messages sent by the institution, the caterer, or Cateringexpert.
Messages are automatically deleted after 30 days.
In the order history, you can view all your orders and cancellations.
To search for a specific entry, enter the desired search term in the search field.
To create a CSV file, go to [CSV Export] and select the desired period.
To create a participant (child) for ordering, enter the child's first and last name.
If the child has allergies, please select the appropriate food. The allergenic foods are set by the respective caterer.
For multiple subgroups, please select the appropriate subgroup. If you do not know the subgroup, please select [Unknown].
If the subgroup can only be set by the institution, this will be displayed in the view.
Without assignment to a subgroup, no order can be placed.
To create another participant, click on [Create another participant].
Under settings, you can adjust your master data and set your preferences for order confirmations and balance reminders.
The IBAN setting is required to be able to withdraw balance.
The specified email address will be used to send order confirmations and balance reminders (if activated).
Please confirm all changes with [Change].
The week plan is provided by your caterer and can be downloaded as a PDF.
Select the desired year and calendar week for which you want to view the week plan.
Then click either [View] or [Download].
If you have not created an account yet, go to [register here].
Enter the Project ID you received from your institution and a valid email address with which you want to register.
After registration, you will receive an email with your username (email address) and your password.
To log in, enter your email address and password and click on [Log in].
IMPORTANT: Pay attention to the correct input of your password, including uppercase and lowercase letters.
For a detailed guide, click on [Click here for more help].
The PDF document will be downloaded in the set language.
To activate education and participation for your account, you need to upload a current notice. Go to [Activate BuT] and upload the file.
Alternatively, you can also send the notice by email to but@cateringexpert.de. However, processing by email can take up to 7 working days.
Important: Please also provide your username and the name of the child for whom you are applying for education and participation.
Once the notice has been reviewed, education and participation will be activated for your account. You will receive a confirmation by email.

ACCOUNT.ERROR_WITHDRAW_FUNDS_NOT_ENOUGH: You currently have no balance in your account.
ACCOUNT.ERROR_WITHDRAW_FUNDS_NOT_IBAN:
To request a payout, please enter your bank details and your current address.

You can enter and edit these details in the navigation under [Settings].
ACCOUNT.WITHDRAW_DEPOSIT_FUNDS_PROCESSED:
Your withdrawal has been received and is being processed.
It can take up to 5 working days for the money to be transferred to your account.
You can view the current status under [Account movement details].
ACCOUNT.SUCCESS_DEPOSIT_MESSAGE:
Your deposit was successful!
The deposit amount has been credited to your account.
ACCOUNT.BETRAG_WURDE_GUTGESCHRIEBEN: The amount has been credited to your account.
ACCOUNT.ERROR_DEPOSIT_MESSAGE:
Your deposit could not be executed.
Please check your input.

If the error persists, please contact support@cateringexpert.de

ACCOUNT.DIRECT_DEPOSIT_DESCRIPTION:
Deposit money directly into your account with PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Giropay, or credit card. The money will be credited to your account immediately.
Enter the desired amount and click on [Direct deposit]. You will then be redirected to our payment provider.
ACCOUNT.FEES_NOTE: Fees for individual payments are charged by the payment providers. Deposit by bank transfer is free of charge. Estimated fees:

ACCOUNT.WITHDRAW_CONFIRMATION: Do you want to withdraw the following balance:
ACCOUNT.WITHDRAW_INSTRUCTIONS: The money will be transferred to your registered bank account. Your registered IBAN is:
ACCOUNT.PROFILE_NOTE: You can view and edit the account details in your profile.
ACCOUNT.BANK_DETAILS_NOTE: Please make sure the account details are correct.
ACCOUNT.TRANSFER_DURATION: The transfer takes up to 5 working days

BESTELLUNG_FIRST_INIT_TEXT_EINS:
The order deadline for the respective order days is set by your catering provider. After the order deadline has expired, it is no longer possible to cancel or change the order.
Important: We (Cateringexpert) have no influence on the order deadlines and cannot change them. We also cannot make any changes after the order deadlines have expired.
We thank you for your understanding.

BUT.BILDUNG_UND_TEILHABE_SUBHEADER:
If you are eligible for education and participation, you can apply for it here.
To apply, click on [Activate BuT].
BUT.BILDUNG_UND_TEILHABE_SUBHEADER_TWO: Only when the status is set to 'Approved' will the costs for the catering be covered.
BUT.EXISTING_BUT: There is already an application. Under Status, you can see the current status. </br> Once the application is approved, the costs for the catering will be covered. </br> To renew and extend an application, please upload the notice for the extension.
BUT.NEW_BUT: To apply, please upload the notice for the cost coverage. </br> Once the application is approved, the costs for the catering will be covered.
BUT.WICHTIG_BUT: The costs for the catering will only be covered after the application has been approved by us. Until then, you have to bear the costs yourself. The costs will be covered retroactively.
BUT.SELECT_FILE_BUT: Select file for education and participation
BUT.DESCRIPTION_TABLE: Here you will find all recorded notices for education and participation. Each entry is confirmed and approved.
BUT.ERINNERUNG_BUT: Please remember to extend your notice for education and participation in time. If the notice expires, the costs for the catering will no longer be covered.
BUT.ADRESSE_CATERINGEXPERT: To place an order through Cateringexpert, the notice for education and participation must be issued to Cateringexpert. To receive a letter for the Employment Agency, please click on [Create letter].
BUT.UPLOAD_ERROR: Error uploading document. Please try again later.
